did.unittitle: Letters to a Civil Engineer in New York State
did.abstract: Letters from Charles Wheeler and others to Edwin A. Case

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Edwin Case was a civil engineer in New York State.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of nine letters written to Edwin A. Case, between 1872-1876, seven from Charles Wheeler and one each from Fred L. Griswold and Thomas Warner. The letters, business and personal, discuss the building of new lines, financial condition of lines, difficulties of surveying, and a job request.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Letters to a Civil Engineer in New York State #5035m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Letters from Fred L. Griswold, Thomas Warner, and Charles Wheeler to Edwin Case
